name: Hidden Animals: English - Spanish
description: Hidden Animals: English - Spanish is a relaxing hidden object game with the aim to teach you the Spanish names of animals featuring exclusive piano music. (You can use the program to study English as well if you are a Spaniard).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 compatible Storage: 450 MB available space Additional Notes: The game is optimized to 16:9 (1920x1080 for example) aspect ratio. The game runs with other aspect ratios as well, but the pictures won't appear in full-screen.
